item.title: Systemc Hello world
item.description: Compiling Systemc Link to heading systemc library can be found on accellera. There are two ways to build it. CMake and good old autoconf. autoconf will do the job just fine. cd systemc-2.3.3 ./configure --prefix=`pwd`/local make make install export SC_INSTALL=`pwd`/local And we are good to go. Compiling application Link to heading I got an example from systemc examples. Again there are several ways to build it But I am going for the minimal compilation command.
